TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit RolePrincipal extends System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public Class RolePrincipal Inherits ClaimsPrincipal Implements ISerializable
type RolePrincipal = class inherit ClaimsPrincipal interface ISerializable

summary.span: 表示当前 HTTP 请求的安全信息，包括角色成员资格。

span.span: Represents security information for the current HTTP request, including role membership.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象将实现接口，并表示 HTTP 请求的当前安全上下文。The object implements the interface and represents the current security context for the HTTP request. 启用角色管理时 (请参阅)，则分配对象传递给属性 。When role management is enabled (see ), the assigns a object to the property of the . 类公开当前 HTTP 请求的安全标识，并另外的角色成员身份进行检查。The class exposes the security identity for the current HTTP request and additionally performs checks for role membership. 如果是`true`，然后对象将管理缓存的角色列表和查找中的已缓存的当前用户的角色成员身份列表前，然后角色。If is `true`, then the object manages the cached list of roles and looks up role membership for the current user in the cached list first, then the role . 如果是`false`，则对象始终会查找使用角色提供程序的角色成员身份。If is `false`, the object always looks up role membership using the role provider. 对象进行加密和解密由标识的 cookie 中缓存的角色信息基于。The object encrypts and decrypts role information cached in the cookie identified by the based on the .

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否修改了利用 对象缓存的角色名称的列表。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the list of role names cached with the object has been modified.

value.span: 如果修改了利用 对象缓存的角色名称的列表，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the list of role names cached with the object has been modified; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性将返回`true`角色名称检索从默认角色后并添加到缓存中，按方法，或当方法调用方法默认角色提供程序，然后接收的响应`true`，从而导致角色名称传递给方法添加到缓存。The property will return `true` after role names have been retrieved from the default role and added to the cache by the method, or when the method calls the method of the default role provider and then receives a response of `true`, resulting in the role name passed to the method being added to the cache. 属性将还返回 true，如果设置为`true`并且已通过，得到新设置。The property will also return true if is set to `true` and the has passed, resulting in a new being set. ## Examples 如果启用了角色管理，下面的示例将显示角色缓存当前用户的信息。The following example displays role-caching information for the current user if role management is enabled. 启用角色管理的信息，请参阅类。For information on enabling role management, see the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal/CS/getroleinfocs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal/VB/getroleinfovb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是`true`并表示的用户的已缓存角色名称，然后方法将在用户所在的缓存中返回的角色名称的列表。If is `true` and role names have been cached for the user represented by the , then the method will return the list of role names in the cache that the user is a member of. 如果没有缓存角色名称，然后方法返回角色名称的列表，用户是从默认角色的成员。If role names have not been cached, then the method returns the list of role names that the user is a member of from the default role . 仅角色名称当前返回。Only role names for the current are returned. 若要确定是否在缓存角色名称对象，检查属性。To determine whether role names have been cached in the object, check the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示登录用户所属的成员的角色的。The following code example displays the roles that the logged-on user is a member of. summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示由 表示的用户是否扮演指定的角色。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the user represented by the is in the specified role.

returns.span: 如果由 表示的用户扮演指定的角色，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if user represented by the is in the specified role; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 首先检查属性来确定是否提供了当前用户的角色名称的缓存的列表。 first checks the property to determine whether a cached list of role names for the current user is available. 如果属性是`true`，会检查缓存的列表以检查指定的角色。If the property is `true`, the cached list is checked for the specified role. 如果方法查找指定的角色中缓存的列表，它将返回`true`。If the method finds the specified role in the cached list, it returns `true`. 如果找不到指定的角色，它将调用方法的默认实例，以确定是否已配置的数据源中的角色相关联的用户名值。If does not find the specified role, it calls the method of the default instance to determine whether the user name is associated with a role from the data source for the configured value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例检查以查看登录的用户是否属于管理员角色允许用户查看用户角色之前。The following code example checks to see whether the logged-on user is in the Administrators role before allowing the user to view user roles. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal/CS/ViewRolescs.aspx#8)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal/VB/ViewRolesvb.aspx#8)]

public: property bool IsRoleListCached { bool get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示用户的角色列表是否已缓存在 Cookie 中。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the list of roles for the user has been cached in a cookie.

value.span: 如果角色名称已缓存在 Cookie 中，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if role names are cached in a cookie; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`cacheRolesInCookie`特性在 Web.config 文件中应用程序设置为`true`，则将当前用户的角色名称的列表写入 cookie 时检查属于特定角色的用户成员身份。If the `cacheRolesInCookie` attribute in the Web.config file for the application is set to `true`, then a list of role names for the current user is written to a cookie when user membership in a particular role is checked. 属性指示角色名称是否已写入 cookie。The property indicates whether role names have been written to the cookie. 请注意，即使`cacheRolesInCookie`配置属性可能`true`，则属性不会返回`true`直到角色信息写入到 cookie 后。Note that, even though the `cacheRolesInCookie` configuration attribute may be `true`, the property does not return `true` until after role information has been written to the cookie. 如果执行的用户没有角色检查将返回`false`。If no role checks are performed for a user, will return `false`. ## Examples 如果启用了角色管理，下面的示例将显示角色缓存当前用户的信息。The following example displays role-caching information for the current user if role management is enabled. 启用角色管理的信息，请参阅类。For information on enabling role management, see the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal/CS/getroleinfocs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal/VB/getroleinfovb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Gets the name of the role provider that stores and retrieves role information for the user.

value.span: 存储和检索用户角色信息的角色提供程序的名称。

span.span: The name of the role provider that stores and retrieves role information for the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性公开的管理所表示的用户的角色信息的角色提供程序名称对象。The property exposes the name of the role provider that manages the role information for the user represented by the object. 这使您可以通过访问用户的特定角色提供程序实例属性的无论提供程序是应用程序的默认提供程序类。This enables you to access the specific role-provider instance for a user by using the property of the class regardless of whether the provider is the default provider for the application. 例如，可能会创建采用的方法，作为输入，并返回所表示的用户角色的列表。For example, you may create a method that takes a as input and returns the list of roles for the represented user. 您可以确保相应的角色提供程序用于返回的角色列表通过调用方法中的角色提供程序按索引的集合属性值。You can ensure that the appropriate role provider is used to return the list of roles for the by calling the method of the role provider from the collection that is indexed by the property value. 若要填充对象的每个请求，必须使用应用程序的 Global.asax 文件中定义的事件处理程序。To populate the object for each request, you must use a event handler defined in the Global.asax file for the application.

summary.span: 将缓存的角色列表标记为已被更改。

span.span: Marks the cached role list as having been changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将标记为已通过设置已更改的缓存的角色列表到`true`并到`false`。The method marks the cached role list as having been changed by setting to `true` and to `false`.

span.span: The role information cached with the object encrypted based on the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的值方法存储在角色 cookie 时是`true`。The value returned by the method is stored in the roles cookie when is `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将的结果写入角色 cookie 的方法。The following code example writes the results of the method to the roles cookie. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Version As Integer
public: property int Version { int get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取角色 Cookie 的版本号。

span.span: Gets the version number of the roles cookie.

value.span: 角色 Cookie 的版本号。

span.span: The version number of the roles cookie.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过在角色 cookie 中包含的版本号，将来的 ASP.NET 版本可以修改角色 cookie 的格式并使用属性来区分不同的格式。By including a version number in the roles cookie, future releases of ASP.NET can modify the format of the roles cookie and use the property to distinguish between different formats. ## Examples 如果启用了角色管理，下面的示例将显示角色缓存当前用户的信息。The following example displays role-caching information for the current user if role management is enabled. 启用角色管理的信息，请参阅类。For information on enabling role management, see the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal/CS/getroleinfocs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal/VB/getroleinfovb.aspx#1)]
